title.rendered: USA announced its 15-man squad for the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2024

content.rendered:
USA Cricket has announced the 15-man squad for the United States for the upcoming ICC T20 World Cup 2024 in the United States and West Indies from June 1 to 29.

As the tournament is fast approaching, the expectations of the team are high as the cricket enthusiasts and fans wonder who will make it to the tournament. Led by 31-year-old Monank Patel, the team includes a mix of new and old faces.

The team also includes former New Zealand player and ICC Men Cricket World Cup 2015 finalist Corey Anderson. The American cricket team will open the tournament by facing Canada in Dallas. They will play Pakistan on June 6 and India on June 12. The United States will also face Ireland in Florida on June 14.

2024 ICC T20 World Cup Squad of USA


The main squad includes:

Monank Patel (Captain)
Aaron Jones (Vice Captain)
Andries Gous
Corey Anderson
Ali Khan
Harmeet Singh
Jessy Singh
Milind Kumar
Nisarg Patel
Nitish Kumar
Noshtush Kenjige
Saurabh Nethralvakar
Shadley Van Schalkwyk
Steven Taylor
Shayan Jahangir

Read Also: India squad for T20 World Cup 2024 announced.
